cross.io
Class DataSourceFactory

java.lang.Object
  cross.io.DataSourceFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
IConfigurable
public class DataSourceFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements IConfigurable

Factory managing objects of type IDataSource. Objects can be registered within cfg/io.properties, key "cross.io.IDataSource". Or by defining them as service implementations of @code{cross.io.IDataSource} in a jar files manifest.

Author:
Nils.Hoffmann@cebitec.uni-bielefeld.de

          Creates an instance of DataSourceServiceLoader and adds available implementations to internal hash map.

public IDataSource getDataSourceFor(IFileFragment ff)
Returns a compatible IDataSource for given IFileFragment. First hit wins, if multiple DataSource implementations are registered for the same file type.
